name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Platform Engineer with 13+ years of experience in cloud-native system deployment and infrastructure management on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Extensive knowledge in **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and adept at using **Terraform** and **Ansible** for infrastructure as code. Proven proficiency in **Python** for automation and service implementation, ensuring high-performance and robust cloud solutions.
Skilled in managing remote teams and aligned with industry standards, driving compliance within platforms. A track record of developing applications in healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging advanced technologies, including AI/ML. Recognized for building and maintaining effective workflows that enhance productivity and foster collaborative remote work environments.

Implemented AI/ML algorithms using scikit-learn, LightGBM, and TensorFlow, personalizing user interfaces and enhancing product visibility, which contributed to a **20%** increase in conversion rates.
